name: FInputDeviceState
doc:
Current state of physical input devices at a point in time.
Assumption is that the state refers to a single physical input device,
ie InputDevice field is a single value of EInputDevices and not a combination.

InputDevice: Which InputDevice member is valid in this state
bShiftKeyDown: Is they keyboard SHIFT modifier key currently pressed down
bAltKeyDown: Is they keyboard ALT modifier key currently pressed down
bCtrlKeyDown: Is they keyboard CTRL modifier key currently pressed down
bCmdKeyDown: Is they keyboard CMD modifier key currently pressed down (only on Apple devices)
Keyboard: Current state of Keyboard device, if InputDevice == EInputDevices::Keyboard
Mouse: Current state of Mouse device, if InputDevice == EInputDevices::Mouse
